      Constructors in gep.selection with parameters of type RandomEngine 
      Constructor and Description
      RouletteWheelSelection(RandomEngine random)
      Creates an instance of the roulette wheel selection algorithm using the provided random engine.
      RouletteWheelSelectionWithElitePreservation(RandomEngine random, double preservationPercentage)
      Creates an instance of the roulette wheel selection algorithm with elite preservation using the given random engine and the given preservation percentage in the interval [0.0, 1.0].
      StochasticUniversalSampling(RandomEngine random)
      Creates an instance of the stochastic universal sampling algorithm using the given random engine.
